LanguageData.Aggro_ZDreamerO:
The outcast grips {Interviewee_possessive} massive uranium breach axe so tightly {Interviewee_possessive} fists are shaking. {Interviewee_possessive} eyes burn with unbridled rage. 

"What kind of person are you?!" {Interviewee_pronoun} yells in your face. "You destroy my life's work and you think I have anything to say to you?" 

{Interviewee_pronoun} suddenly relaxes and deeply breathes out. You don't like the look on {Interviewee_possessive} face - it's the same look raiders when they decide to throw their lives away. 

You have a few seconds to decide what happens next.
LanguageData.Fight_ZDreamer: You won't be intimidated by a lowly outcast.
LanguageData.DontFight_ZDreamer: Maybe you made a mistake. Retreat.
